output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No visible CMF number, but this doesn't automatically disqualify it as propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "George Simion", who is a presidential candidate (Position 2 on the ballot).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement reaching between 4,000-4,999 impressions, promoting a public march.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, evident through: - Use of hashtag #georgesimionpresedinte - Organization of a support march specifically for the presidential candidate - Multiple campaign-related hashtags (#alegeri2024, #alegeri)
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly a promotional/organizing post for a political event, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an organized campaign activity.
The post promotes a march in support of a presidential candidate after the campaign period has ended, which directly violates Article 55 t).

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - Organizes a public march of support - Uses campaign hashtags - Is a paid advertisement reaching thousands - Occurs after the campaign period has ended
conclusion.message-for-police: SC VIDEO DANCRYS-STUDIO SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mars de sustinere pentru candidatul George Simion la presedintie dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala, in data de 22.11.2024. Postarea cu ID-ul 568354982553353 reprezinta propaganda electorala explicita prin organizarea unui eveniment public de sustinere a candidatului, utilizarea hashtag-urilor de campanie (#georgesimionpresedinte), si promovarea platita pe Facebook si Instagram, cu un impact estimat intre 4000-4999 de afisari, dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Actiunea are un evident caracter electoral si urmareste influentarea votului prin mobilizarea sustinatorilor intr-o actiune publica de sustinere a candidatului la presedintie.
